title: Samsung pulls the Galaxy S21 Ultra from its store ahead of S Pen-wielding sequel
content:
The Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra was one of our favorite phones of 2021, but with its sequel around the corner, it’s a phone that’s going to start to fade away. Ahead of the Galaxy S22’s unveil, Samsung has just removed the Galaxy S21 Ultra from its website, seemingly signaling that the phone has been discontinued.

more…

The post Samsung pulls the Galaxy S21 Ultra from its store ahead of S Pen-wielding sequel appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung has removed the Galaxy S21 Ultra from its online store, hinting that the phone may have been discontinued ahead of its sequel.
